title: test_secure_user_authentication_and_role_based_access
description: Verify that the user authentication system securely logs in users and enforces role-based access control to restrict access to features based on user roles.

title: test_natural_language_query_processing_accuracy
description: Test the conversational interface's ability to accurately interpret and respond to complex Portuguese natural language queries with a minimum accuracy of 95%.

title: test_agent_response_including_text_numbers_and_visualizations
description: Validate that the agent returns responses containing text, numerical data, and dynamic visualizations such as charts and tables as requested by the user.

title: test_dashboard_load_time_and_interactivity
description: Ensure that the main dashboard loads key business KPIs within 5 seconds and supports interactive filtering, sorting, and exploration of data visualizations.

title: test_administrator_monitoring_and_metadata_management
description: Verify that administrators can monitor data pipeline health, track data integration status, and manage business metadata through the provided interfaces.

title: test_user_conversation_history_accessibility
description: Check that users can access and review their past conversation history within the chat interface.

title: test_secure_data_encryption_in_transit_and_at_rest
description: Validate that all sensitive business data is encrypted both during transmission and when stored, complying with security requirements.

title: test_system_logging_and_error_monitoring
description: Ensure that the system captures all critical events and errors through structured logging for audit and troubleshooting purposes.

title: test_system_performance_under_increased_load
description: Test that the system maintains performance and reliability when handling a 50% increase in user load and 100% increase in data volume without degradation.

title: test_integration_with_sql_server_and_openai_models
description: Verify the integration with SQL Server for data querying and OpenAI language models for natural language processing to ensure seamless data retrieval and response generation.
